channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No sign at the junction of Harp Hill nd B4075 to indicate that the road at the top is closed. I had to drive all the way up to the junction and then back down on what must be one of the worst maintained roads in Cheltenham., 29th April
item.description:
Driving from the North to the Harp Hill junction no sign at all.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Information board identifying emergency contact company/number not displayed

item.title: Street lamp not working, 29th April
item.description:
Light not working

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Craven Drive, Churchdown, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
